This unnamed guy is '''[[Mona]]<nowiki/>'s''' new '''boyfriend''' after her breakup with [[Ross Geller|Ross]]. He was portrayed by [[Mark Lutz]].

Mona and her boyfriend start making out in her apartment, while Ross hid behind the couch waiting for an opportunity to get his shirt back. But Mona had given the shirt to her new boyfriend after she spilled wine on his shirt.
